fail.name: Ionized
fail.desc: An ionized starship has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks

automation.title: Ionizing
automation.text: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or it is ionized for 1 minute. As an action by a crewmember on their turn, the ship can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect early on a success. Ships larger than you have advantage on the saving throw.

automation.title: Ionizing
automation.text: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or it is ionized for 1 minute. As an action by a crewmember on their turn, the ship can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect early on a success. Ships larger than you have advantage on the saving throw.

fail.name: Stunned
fail.desc:
A stunned ship has 4 Slowed Levels.
 - The ship automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
 - Attack rolls against the ship have advantage.

automation.title: Connor Net
automation.text: On a failed saving throw for a missile or upon detonation for a mine, a conner net deploys on the target, which must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 15). On a failed save, the ship is stunned for 1 minute. As an action on each of their turns, a crewmember can have the ship repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

automation.title: Connor Net
automation.text: On a failed saving throw for a missile or upon detonation for a mine, a conner net deploys on the target, which must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 15). On a failed save, the ship is stunned for 1 minute. As an action on each of their turns, a crewmember can have the ship repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

buttons.label: Discord Missile - End of Turn
buttons.verb: takes a level of system damage

automation.text: At the end of each of the target ship - s turns, the target ship gains one level of system damage if the target is medium or smaller [large or smaller].

As an action on each of their turns, a crewmember can have the ship attempt their choice of a dexterity or constitution saving throw (DC 15), ending the effect on a success.

EMP BOMB

automation.title: Discord Missile
automation.text: On a failed saving throw, the missile deploys pistoeka sabotage or - buzz - droids on the target. At the end of each of the target ship - s turns, the target ship gains one level of system damage if the target is medium or smaller [large or smaller]. As an action on each of their turns, a crewmember can have the ship attempt their choice of a dexterity or constitution saving throw (DC 15), ending the effect on a success.

fail.name: S-Thread Tracer Attached
fail.desc: When making an Intelligence (Probe) check to detect the S-threaded ship’s hyperspace travel, its angle of departure can be detected on a roll of 15 instead of 25

automation.title: S-Thread Tracer
automation.text: On a failed saving throw, the missile latches an S-thread tracer onto the target. When making an Intelligence (Probe) check to detect the S-threaded ship’s hyperspace travel, its angle of departure can be detected on a roll of 15 instead of 25.

A Flechette torpedo detonates at a point within range, creating a 200 (400) foot cube of difficult terrain. Any ship entering or starting their turn in this area must succeed at a Dexterity saving throw (DC 15) or take 1d8 [2d8] kinetic damage.
automation.title: Flechette Torpedo
Flechette Torpedo
automation.text: A Flechette torpedo detonates at a point within range, creating a 200 (400) foot cube of difficult terrain. Any ship entering or starting their turn in this area must succeed at a Dexterity saving throw (DC 15) or take 1d8 [2d8] kinetic damage.
